text: I said why in the world would you do
something like this and he didn't answer
me
I had received a call from congressman
efforts staff wanting to know if I was
going to be there and I said yes that I
would be there I'm a Republican yes I
was going to talk to her about the
military and and and the Obamacare and
TRICARE I've worked for canvas for Don
telephone calls for I carried a notepad
with me with a couple of questions on it
couple of gentlemen came up and they
were ready to sweep me aside they didn't
they weren't working for the Giffords
staff they were very condescending
towards me then Gabe came over who only
had about two more minutes to live and
asked us not to the shout and I was
talking to some of the other people that
were standing waiting to talk to the
congresswoman when the shots were fired
there was just a consistent bang bang
bang
bang and I looked over to where
gabrielle giffords had been standing and
there was a very athletic young man
pumping rounds out he was his aiming and
shooting the people one right after the
other look we're sitting in the chairs
he was about 10 or 12 feet away from me
he was firing directly towards me nobody
screamed you know it was just kind of a
rustle rustling noise as they were
hitting the floor I suppose that it
might be a good idea to get down on the
ground and to play dead as I was going
towards the ground I was hit in the knee
and when I ducked down because they were
ducking down and I started to hit the
ground and that's when I felt the grace
in the back of my head and the shooting
stopped and when the shooting stopped
some individual which i think is the
real hero i had taken one of the folding
chairs and folded it and hit him on the
back of the head and that gave me the
opportunity to grab him with my left
hand by his left wrist i said why in the
world would you do something like this
and he didn't answer me i started
walking towards my car to get my cell
phone to phone it in I recall clunk
walking staggering across the parking
lot saying to a woman who was pushing a
shopping cart I been shot and she looked
at me like I was crazy first night I was
in the hospital everything kept going
back through my mind and I thought well
what might be a way to focus my
facilities and and to take my mind off
the recent events would be to write down
the Declaration of Independence which I
memorized some time ago you might call
it political therapy but I'm a Democrat
Thomas Jefferson founded the Democratic
Party some other people who've spoken to
the nightmares and trauma well as do you
feel that kind of anxiety I didn't think
that I did but this morning on national
TV and the big skew see the big screen
right there why they were showing these
people laying on the floor in the
airport's sleeping and when I saw that I
broke down because you know it was just
like seeing the people laying on the
sidewalk over there that had been shot
and I just I just wasn't ready for that
shock this morning and you know it got
to me
